heroSection.name: LYES GUEBGHID
heroSection.quote: Passionate about learning, coding, and bringing ideas to life through games.

projectsList.name: CastFlow
projectsList.description: CastFlow is a platform that connects aspiring talent with recruiters in the entertainment industry. It offers a user-friendly interface for talent to showcase their skills and for recruiters to find the right candidates.

projectsList.name: Elekable
projectsList.description: Elekable is a platform that allows users to buy and sell electricity in a transparent and secure market. It focuses on real-time pricing, renewable energy, and secure transactions, making it easier for users to manage their energy needs.

projectsList.name: Flight Reservation App
projectsList.description: Developed a desktop application using Java (Swing) for booking and managing flight reservations. Features include real-time flight search, passenger registration, and seat selection, with a user-friendly GUI and local database integration for data persistence.

projectsList.name: TreeView Component
projectsList.description: Built with Blazor (.NET), this TreeView component loads data only when nodes are expanded, improving performance for large datasets. It supports asynchronous loading, nested structures, and is fully reusable.

playerProfile.name: LYES GUEBGHID
playerProfile.subtitle: Developer | Master of Informatics
playerProfile.aboutMeParagraph: Enthusiastic developer with a strong foundation in software engineering and IT. Experienced in building web applications and solving complex problems. Seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative projects and grow professionally.
playerProfile.hobbyMusic: Listening to music and learning how it's made
